column4: Hmmm, before I go testing this out, does anyone know for sure what this option in xorg.conf does? "Option  "ZAxisMapping" "4 5"" <- I am hoping for scroll speed, but who knows.
I think it's just the emulated buttons for the mouse wheel.
If you reverse the order, the wheel will work reversed.
Ok, well, I'll keep looking then, I have a hunch this is in the gnome settings, not X
